Doctor's Office.english: 1. The doctor will see you now.
Doctor's Office.italian: Il dottore ti vedrà ora.
Doctor's Office.spanish: El médico te verá ahora.
Doctor's Office.german: Der Arzt wird dich jetzt sehen.

Doctor's Office.english: 2. Please fill out this medical form.
Doctor's Office.italian: Per favore, compila questo modulo medico.
Doctor's Office.spanish: Por favor, completa este formulario médico.
Doctor's Office.german: Bitte fülle dieses medizinische Formular aus.

Doctor's Office.english: 3. I need to make an appointment.
Doctor's Office.italian: Devo prendere un appuntamento.
Doctor's Office.spanish: Necesito hacer una cita.
Doctor's Office.german: Ich muss einen Termin vereinbaren.

Doctor's Office.english: 4. The nurse will take your blood pressure.
Doctor's Office.italian: L'infermiere misurerà la tua pressione sanguigna.
Doctor's Office.spanish: La enfermera tomará tu presión arterial.
Doctor's Office.german: Die Krankenschwester wird deinen Blutdruck messen.

Doctor's Office.english: 5. Have you been experiencing any pain?
Doctor's Office.italian: Hai avuto dolore?
Doctor's Office.spanish: ¿Has tenido algún dolor?
Doctor's Office.german: Hast du Schmerzen?

Doctor's Office.english: 6. We need to run some tests.
Doctor's Office.italian: Dobbiamo fare alcuni test.
Doctor's Office.spanish: Necesitamos realizar algunas pruebas.
Doctor's Office.german: Wir müssen einige Tests durchführen.

Doctor's Office.english: 7. Take two tablets with water after meals.
Doctor's Office.italian: Prendi due compresse con acqua dopo i pasti.
Doctor's Office.spanish: Toma dos tabletas con agua después de las comidas.
Doctor's Office.german: Nimm zwei Tabletten nach den Mahlzeiten mit Wasser ein.

Doctor's Office.english: 8. The doctor will examine your ears.
Doctor's Office.italian: Il dottore esaminerà le tue orecchie.
Doctor's Office.spanish: El médico examinará tus oídos.
Doctor's Office.german: Der Arzt wird deine Ohren untersuchen.

Doctor's Office.english: 9. Please remove your shoes and step on the scale.
Doctor's Office.italian: Per favore, togli le scarpe e sali sulla bilancia.
Doctor's Office.spanish: Por favor, quítate los zapatos y sube a la báscula.
Doctor's Office.german: Bitte zieh deine Schuhe aus und stell dich auf die Waage.

Doctor's Office.english: 10. You need to get a prescription for this medication.
Doctor's Office.italian: Devi ottenere una prescrizione per questo farmaco.
Doctor's Office.spanish: Necesitas obtener una receta para este medicamento.
Doctor's Office.german: Du musst ein Rezept für dieses Medikament bekommen.

Doctor's Office.english: 11. I'm feeling a bit dizzy.
Doctor's Office.italian: Mi sento un po' stordito.
Doctor's Office.spanish: Me siento un poco mareado.
Doctor's Office.german: Mir ist etwas schwindelig.

Doctor's Office.english: 12. The waiting room is over there.
Doctor's Office.italian: La sala d'attesa è là.
Doctor's Office.spanish: La sala de espera está allí.
Doctor's Office.german: Der Wartebereich ist dort drüben.

Doctor's Office.english: 13. Are you allergic to any medications?
Doctor's Office.italian: Sei allergico a qualche medicinale?
Doctor's Office.spanish: ¿Eres alérgico a algún medicamento?
Doctor's Office.german: Bist du gegen irgendwelche Medikamente allergisch?

Doctor's Office.english: 14. Please lie down on the examination table.
Doctor's Office.italian: Sdraiati sul lettino per l'esame.
Doctor's Office.spanish: Por favor, acuéstate en la camilla de examen.
Doctor's Office.german: Bitte leg dich auf die Untersuchungsliege.

Doctor's Office.english: 15. You need to fast for 12 hours before the blood test.
Doctor's Office.italian: Devi digiunare per 12 ore prima del test del sangue.
Doctor's Office.spanish: Debes ayunar durante 12 horas antes del análisis de sangre.
Doctor's Office.german: Du musst vor dem Bluttest 12 Stunden lang fasten.

Doctor's Office.english: 16. The doctor will give you a prescription for antibiotics.
Doctor's Office.italian: Il dottore ti darà una prescrizione per gli antibiotici.
Doctor's Office.spanish: El médico te recetará antibióticos.
Doctor's Office.german: Der Arzt wird dir ein Rezept für Antibiotika geben.

Doctor's Office.english: 17. We will schedule a follow-up appointment for next week.
Doctor's Office.italian: Pianificheremo un appuntamento di controllo per la prossima settimana.
Doctor's Office.spanish: Programaremos una cita de seguimiento para la próxima semana.
Doctor's Office.german: Wir werden einen Termin für nächste Woche vereinbaren.

Doctor's Office.english: 18. I'm going to refer you to a specialist.
Doctor's Office.italian: Ti manderò da uno specialista.
Doctor's Office.spanish: Voy a derivarte a un especialista.
Doctor's Office.german: Ich werde dich an einen Facharzt überweisen.

Doctor's Office.english: 19. Please take a deep breath and exhale slowly.
Doctor's Office.italian: Fai un respiro profondo e espira lentamente.
Doctor's Office.spanish: Por favor, respira profundamente y exhala lentamente.
Doctor's Office.german: Bitte atme tief ein und atme langsam aus.

Doctor's Office.english: 20. The doctor will explain the test results to you.
Doctor's Office.italian: Il dottore ti spiegherà i risultati dei test.
Doctor's Office.spanish: El médico te explicará los resultados de los análisis.
Doctor's Office.german: Der Arzt wird dir die Testergebnisse erklären.
